meaningMnemonic: A <radical>shellfish</radical> with a <radical>knife</radical> makes all the <kanji>rule</kanji>s. It isn't supposed to be making rules, but it has a knife, so who's going to argue?
readingMnemonic: The first <kanji>rule</kanji> the shellfish enacts is that all humans take off their <reading>sock</reading>s (そく) and give them to him. Hmm... is this some kind of nasty shellfish? Who would want socks?
